Ok, I've got your details. Let's get started.

values: 1. Kindly remove and reinsert the SIM. Go to settings and ensure your default APN is "www" or "vodafonemobileconnect" 2. Select Network operator manually: Goto Settings - More - Mobile/Cellular Network - Network operator - Select network manually as "Vodafone IN". 3. Select Network mode as GSM(3G) only: Goto settings - More - Mobile/Cellular Network - Preferred Network type/mode - select GSM only or 3G only.

As a name change requires identity proof, we are unable to process it online.  But, you can visit your nearest Vodafone store along with your Proof of Identity(both a photo copy and an original) and they can process the request for Name correction.
As I check the details, the monthly statements will be sent to your registered email ($email).

New sim activation Procedure:
With old SIM in the handset,
  1. send SMS SIMEX{space}{19/20 digit new SIM number} to 55199 (Toll Free).
  2. Once you get a response, enter the last 6 digits of the new SIM number as and send it to 55199
  3. Wait for 5 minutes and insert the new SIM in the handset

NOTE: Please ensure you send last 6 digits once again to 55199 within 2 hours of receiving the SMS. Otherwise repeat the above steps.

On your @phone-make phone, do the following:

1: Tap on Applications icon.
2: Tap on Settings icon.
3: Tap on More.
4: Tap on Mobile networks.
5: Tap on SIM 1 or SIM 2 tab.
6: Tap on Preferred network type.
7: Tap on WCDMA
8: Tap on Back.
9: Tap on Back.
10: Tap on Back.
11: Tap on Back.

Our sincere apologies for the mistake. As a name change requires identity proof, we are unable to process it online.  But, you can visit your nearest Vodafone store along with your Proof of Identity(both photo copy and the original) and they can process the request for Name correction.

Then the data should work fine. Please try restarting the phone.

There are multiple payment modes including online and store.

To get your SIM changed/replaced, here is the process to follow. You have to submit the following documents in Vodafone store/Mini store -
  1. POI(Proof of Identity)
    • Aadhar card
    • PAN card
    • Passport
    • Driver’s license
    • Voter ID
  2. SIMEX form(Customer application form).

Charges Rs.25 will be deducted from main balance(minimum balance Rs.26 is required if SIM replacement is chargeable) and new sim will be activated within 2 hrs.

In case, you have another Vodafone number, you can also send an SMS as STORE {space} AREA PIN or AREA NAME to 199 (Toll Free) to know the nearest Vodafone Store.

Balance, Validity & VAS services will carry forward. Please note that, you will not have your contact & sms details in your new SIM card. So please ensure you back them up first.

Post SIM replacement, incoming and outgoing SMS will be barred for 24 hours for your security purpose. You will be communicated via SMS prior to installation and post release of SMS barring.

To request for a duplicate bill, up to the last 12 months, you have the following options:
  1. Send an SMS to 199 (toll-free) to get bill to your registered email : DUPBILL{space}first 3 letters of month.
  2. From your mobile app do the following:
    • Click on My Account
    • View bills
    • Now, you will get the summary of current bill on the same page.
    • Click On Itemized bill to check current month's detailed bill and if you want to check last 12 months bill just click on request old bill option under View bills .
    • You can click on Download bill option to download the bills.
To start receiving bills on your email, please register here.

Please visit your nearest Vodafone store along with the following: 1 recent passport size photograph, a copy of photo ID proof like pan card, passport, etc & proof of address like passport, adhaar card,etc. I would also request you to carry the above copy of documents along with their originals for spot verification. Carry the old SIM card and the charges for a new Pre paid SIM card  Once you receive the new SIM card, please note It will be partially activated within 24 hour.
